Submodule with useful optimizer utilities.

grape.embiggen.embedders.optimizers.apply_centralized_gradients(optimizers: tensorflow.python.keras.optimizer_v2.optimizer_v2.OptimizerV2)

Replaces the get_gradients method with the one centralizing the gradient.
